languages.text: "Ценю вашу прямоту. Позволю себе ответную — моя голова останется на плечах, будьте уверены. А вот ваш надменный котелок я снесу с невыразимым удовольствием. Как же вы мне надоели, Ваша Светлость!"
"I value your bluntness. Let me match it: while my head will remain firmly on my shoulders, I will remove yours with the utmost pleasure. I tire of your arrogance, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Ценю вашу прямоту. Позволю себе ответную — моя голова останется на плечах, будьте уверены. А вот ваш надменный котелок я снесу с невыразимым удовольствием. Как же вы мне надоели, Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: "I value your sincerity. I will allow myself to also be frank — and rest assured that my head is staying on my shoulders. Your arrogant one, however, I will remove from your shoulders with utmost pleasure.I'm so sick of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I value your sincerity. I will allow myself to also be frank — and rest assured that my head is staying on my shoulders. Your arrogant one, however, I will remove from your shoulders with utmost pleasure.I'm so sick of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I value your bluntness. Let me match your frankness too—and rest assured, my head is staying on my shoulders. Your arrogant one, however, I will remove it from your shoulders with utmost pleasure. I'm so sick of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I value your bluntness. Let me match your frankness too—and rest assured, my head is staying on my shoulders. Your arrogant one, however, I will remove it from your shoulders with utmost pleasure. I'm so sick of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I value your bluntness. Let me match it: rest assured, my head is staying on my shoulders. Your arrogant one, however, I will remove with the utmost pleasure. You are simply too much of a nuisance, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I value your bluntness. Let me match it: while my head will remain firmly on my shoulders, I will remove yours with the utmost pleasure. I tire of your arrogance, {name}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « J'apprécie votre franc-parler et je vais donc vous répondre tout aussi franchement. Ma tête ne bougera pas de mes épaules ; la vôtre, en revanche, je me ferai un plaisir de la trancher. J'en ai assez de votre arrogance, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "I value your bluntness. Let me match it: while my head will remain firmly on my shoulders, I will remove yours with the utmost pleasure. I tire of your arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « J'apprécie votre franc-parler. Je vais être tout aussi franc, et vous pouvez me croire, ma tête ne bougera pas de mes épaules. La vôtre, en revanche, je me ferai un plaisir de la trancher pour vous faire payer votre arrogance. J'en ai plus qu'assez de vous, Votre Seigneurie ! »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Aprecio su franqueza. Permita que l{mf|e|a} trate con la misma moneda: mi cabeza permanecerá firmemente unida al resto de mi cuerpo, pero disfrutaré inmensamente arrancando la suya. Me he cansado de su arrogancia, {name}».
languages.original_text: "I value your bluntness. Let me match it: while my head will remain firmly on my shoulders, I will remove yours with the utmost pleasure. I tire of your arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Aprecio su franqueza. Deje que la iguale: mi cabeza seguirá estando sobre mis hombros, descuide. La suya, en cambio, con toda su arrogancia, pienso arrancarla de los suyos con absoluto deleite. ¡No pienso seguir tolerando su presencia, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “我欣赏你的坦率，那我也像你一样坦率吧。不用担心，我的头会好好地长在我的脖子上。不过，我会怀着无上的喜悦，把你的头砍下来。我已经受够了你的傲慢，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "I value your bluntness. Let me match it: while my head will remain firmly on my shoulders, I will remove yours with the utmost pleasure. I tire of your arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “我欣赏你的坦率，那我也像你一样坦率吧。不用担心，我的头会好好地长在我的脖子上。不过，至于你那颗傲慢的头，我会怀着无上的喜悦，把它从你的脖子上摘下来。我已经受够你了，大人！”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ich weiß Eure Direktheit zu schätzen. Und ich will ebenso offen sein: So lange mein Kopf noch auf meinen Schultern ruht, entferne ich den Euren mit dem größten Vermögen. Ich bin Eurer Arroganz überdrüssig, {name}."
languages.original_text: "I value your bluntness. Let me match it: while my head will remain firmly on my shoulders, I will remove yours with the utmost pleasure. I tire of your arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß Eure Direktheit zu schätzen. Und ich will ebenso offen sein — und ich versichere Euch, mein Kopf bleibt auf meinen Schultern. Euer arroganter Kopf jedoch, den werde ich mit größtem Vergnügen von Euren Schultern trennen. Ich bin Eurer so dermaßen überdrüssig, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「私は、あなたの率直さは気に入っているのだ。どれ、私もそれに応えよう…安心してくれ、私の首はまだ繋がったままだ。だが、あなたの首は私が喜んでもらい受ける。もう、その傲慢さにはうんざりなのだ、{name}！」
languages.original_text: "I value your bluntness. Let me match it: while my head will remain firmly on my shoulders, I will remove yours with the utmost pleasure. I tire of your arrogance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、あなたの率直さは気に入っているのだ。どれ、私もそれに応えよう…安心してくれ、私の首はまだ繋がったままだ。だが、あなたの首は私が喜んでもらい受ける。もう、その傲慢さにはうんざりなのだ、{name}！」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Açık sözlülüğüne değer veriyorum. Ben de açık sözlü olacağım. Kendi kellem omuzlarımın üstünde sapasağlam dururken senin kelleni şahane bir zevkle alacağım. Küstahlığından bıktım {name}."
languages.original_text: "I value your bluntness. Let me match it: while my head will remain firmly on my shoulders, I will remove yours with the utmost pleasure. I tire of your arrogance, {name}."
